SEARCH
Package manager

Class Inventory.InventoryItem

java.lang.Object
manager.Inventory.InventoryItem
Enclosing class:
Inventory
public static class Inventory.InventoryItem extends Object
This class represents an inventory item, which has a name, quantity in stock, and cost.
